text: 1.3 Apo 2.33-34, 2 Ko 4.4, Kol 1.15-17, 1.20, Hib 8.1, Lep 4.11 Pen Ñɨne ne ke ma mɨdeb, God mɨdeb tek nep mɨdeb. Ne abe God mɨdɨl ak nɨm, chɨnop mɨlek pug yomub. Takaw kɨles tɨmel ne ak dɨl agek, lum awl tap okok mɨdupsek gɨtep gɨl mɨdtep gup. Binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨl, gach kɨlop wik yokak. Wog anɨb ak gɨjuwɨl, amɨl Bɨnonɨm kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl adek alaŋ mɨdeb ak, ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd ne okok besɨgak.
